headline: 1 Magnificent Dividend King Stock Down 40% to Buy and Hold Forever
summary: It is hard to find good dividend stocks that operate in cyclical industries.  Dividend King Nucor (NYSE: NUE) is an even better example, hailing from the steel industry.  If you are looking for a reliable dividend stock today, Dividend King Nucor's roughly 40% pullback from its highs is a potential opportunity.
